channel.title: Runescapes Peak?
channel.description:
I havnt played runescape for years, but i looked at the website earlier and it has 72k players online, now thats dead low IIRC, i have seen it at 250k online before, whats the highest you've seen online?
RS is dying, ggs

item.title: Runescapes Peak?
item.dc:creator: @A_Legend A Legend
item.description:
@A_Legend wrote:

I havnt played runescape for years, but i looked at the website earlier and it has 72k players online, now thats dead low IIRC, i have seen it at 250k online before, whats the highest you've seen online?

RS is dying, ggs

The amount of people online depends on what time of day it is, In mid-day there is normally around that amount of players but at night time well, into the “PM” there is allot more players online such as America etc bringing it to 100/200k

Read full topic

item.title: Runescapes Peak?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:22, topic:260639”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=344190.msg2684585#msg2684585 date=1235595166]

It used to be like 250k+

When new skills had come out. But I find 250k a little big more like 200k max.
[/quote]
No, i’m sure it was about 250k everyday at some point.[/quote]

I would guess 200k in the summer myself, as 250k is getting near the capacity of the servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescapes Peak?
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:13, topic:260639”][quote author=Fishstix link=topic=344190.msg2658590#msg2658590 date=1234040613]

[quote author=haticks link=topic=344190.msg2658530#msg2658530 date=1234035718]

A number probably cannot be calculated but i wonder how many people quit RS when bounty hunter came out?
[/quote](since BH was an improvement)
[/quote]I lol’d. BH and the Grand Exchange killed the game off. They both made the game way too easy. I want challenge when i play a game, not some newbie-fest where everything is handed to you on a golden plate.

the guy who made rsbot

Speljohn didn’t bot all that much on his character back when we played…Well his main anyway.

he still is the guy who made rsbot

Is developing a runescape bot not a challenge? I think it is.[/quote]

He made runescape easy for everyone… A lot easier than Jagex ever did.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescapes Peak?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:9, topic:260639”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=344190.msg2657374#msg2657374 date=1233959826]

[quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=344190.msg2657001#msg2657001 date=1233942074]
A number probably cannot be calculated but i wonder how many people quit RS when bounty hunter came out?
[/quote](since BH was an improvement)
[/quote]I lol’d. BH and the Grand Exchange killed the game off. They both made the game way too easy. I want challenge when i play a game, not some newbie-fest where everything is handed to you on a golden plate.[/quote]

No, removing the Wilderness killed the game off. That’s when almost 50% of players stopped playing. Bounty Hunter allowed floods of people to come back (I would guess about one third of those who left came back in response to BH). The GE on the other hand was obviously added to control the economy after RWT was removed.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescapes Peak?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

A good couple negative thousand.

I think you were referring to when the Wilderness was stripped of its pking versus when BH came out (since BH was an improvement), so I’ll talk about that instead.

I would guess (based on floating rumors and logic) that about half the members quit. I can’t give a number of F2p, even though they matter more, but w/e. Half the members is still quite a stab, and a lot of the F2p only played because of pking…

And, @ the topic: There are currently 147289 people playing! 4:49 CTRL

US time matters more than you Brits, as more US players play RS than any other country’s.

Read full topic
